body.p: The XmenController class is a RESTful API controller in the marvel.heros package. It provides endpoints for managing X-Men entities, such as creating, updating, retrieving, and deleting X-Men records. This controller is designed to interact with the XmenRepository to perform CRUD operations on the X-Men data.

The class uses Spring Framework annotations to define REST endpoints and inject dependencies. It follows standard RESTful practices with methods for handling HTTP requests such as GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE.
